pages.text: Terramity adds guns as a new weapon type, and can be just as much of your loadout as a melee weapon, so it's important to know how to use them.$(br2)Similar to bows and other ranged weapons in minecraft, guns are fired by right clicking.

Crouching and right clicking will attempt to reload them.$(br2)In your keybinds, you'll find a keybind called 'Auto Fire', but don't change this off of right click unless you have right click set to something else!
